name: Karma
description:
Karma means the reflection of our actions.
The harm we do to others definitely has Karma, and we will see the repercussions of our actions.

Look at the reflection!
Just like the multi-faceted mirror you see in this artwork.
There is Karma so that our promises won't be forgotten!
And this is God's law.

All the objects of this scene are rendered in 3D.
To be seen with audio on.
